item.title: Pachelbel’s Canon (in D) Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: D, A, Bm, F#m, G
A version of the song in the original key of D was requested...so here it is!
Tutorial Video in C (GCEA & DGBE): @MK0A
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from @
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit @f

Check out the "merch": @ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Jack Stauber - Buttercup
item.description:
Buttercup by Jack Stauber, with lyrics. Chords used: Gmaj7 & F sharp minor. For educational use. The chords for the intro and outro have been intentionally omitted to make it easier to play. The Gmaj7 could be replaced with a regular G chord. The F sharp minor chord is the same shape as a G7, just played on strings 2, 3, and 4.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Saxophone Dreamsound - Driving Home for Christmas - Key of A
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Driving Home For Christmas - Chris Rea
Using the chords: A Bm C#m7 D E7 Em F#m G I have simplified the chords to make the song accessible to more players. If you would prefer, you can replae the E7 chord tih an E and the C#m7 chord with a C#m.
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Mama Cass - Dream A Little Dream Of Me - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Dream A Little Dream Of Me - The Mamas & The Paps Music by Fabian Andre and Wilbur Schwandt and lyrics by Gus Kahn
Using the chords: A A7 Bm B7 C E7 F Fm F#m G7 Ab
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or DU DU DU DU
This is not an easy play along but with lots of practice it is very playable and devinitely worth the work.
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Now United - All Day - Key of Bm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm (Transposed down a half step from the original).
Chords Used: G, A, F#m, Bm
As performed by Now United.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tZEklY1fgdQ
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Motion background from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music - Key of D
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Can Hear Music - The Beach Boys
Using the chords: A A7 D D7 Em F#m G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
